revised_title: Investigating the Earth's Atmosphere Oscillations with Latitude and Height Variations
tldr: The author investigates the oscillations of the Earth's atmosphere, taking into account temperature variations with latitude and the existence of zonal winds. They discuss the limitations of the resonance theory and propose a new model that considers temperature variations with both height and latitude. This model aims to address the discrepancies found in the resonance theory and provide a better understanding of the solar semi-diurnal oscillation and its relation to the lunar oscillation.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
